attributes.action: Save the Royal British Legion Club- TEWKESBURY
attributes.additional_details:
The Abbey Lawn Trust based in TEWKESBURY who are supposed to support the local communities. 
Certain personnel within the trust would like to close the club and change its use however locals would prefer to stand for their right and protest against this idea. 
Will you help out ? 
Help save a much loved club within Tewkesbury to which has been based in this town for hundreds off years.
attributes.background: The Royal British Legion is due to close I. Tewkesbury as from September 2020. This petition is for people to sign to save the club from closing, it is a great and lively environment and will create a lot of unhappy people who will really miss the place if it closes.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

The Royal British Legion is a charity and independent of the Government and Parliament. This is therefore a decision for the Legion itself. You can find out how to contact the Royal British Legion here:

https://www.britishlegion.org.uk/
